channel.title: Some freaking help with Dialogues?

item.title: Some freaking help with Dialogues?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

public void talk4(String text, String text2, String text3, String text4, int npc) { sendFrame126(GetNpcName(npc), 4902); sendFrame126(text, 4903); sendFrame126(text2, 4904); sendFrame126(text3, 4905); sendFrame126(text4, 4906); sendFrame75(npc, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); }
Usage:

talk4("Line 1 text", "Line 2 text", "Line 3 text", "Line 4 text", npcID);

Read full topic

item.title: Some freaking help with Dialogues?
item.dc:creator: @swodlayer swodlayer
item.description:
@swodlayer wrote:

		case 6:
			sendFrame200(4883, 591);
			sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
			sendFrame126("Well, if you find somone who does want runes, please",4885);
			sendFrame126("send them my way.", 4886);
			sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
			sendFrame164(4882);
			NpcDialogueSend = true;
			break;

The “send them my way.” part is where usually the “Click here to continue” thing is. How do i get 2 lines of text in 1 dialogue screen, or even more?

Thanks =)

Read full topic
